divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and i saw thath boy taking some pictures of the sky, that was the moment when we looked at the sky to find 10-15 red ligths becoming to orange. Those ligths were moving slowly and at the same time were to line up in shape of arrow. 15 minutes before 9pm, those orange arrow desapear slowly in the sky. It was incredible!!!
